      • getGroupSpawn

        public abstract org.bukkit.Location getGroupSpawn(String group)
        Get the location of the spawn for the wanted group
        Parameters:
        group - name of the group. If null, return the location of the default spawn.
        Returns:
        location of the spawn point. If no location has been set for the group, return the default spawn.
